data.event: Buto (Greek: Βουτώ, Arabic: بوتو‎, Butu), Butus (Greek: Βοῦτος, Boutos), or Butosus, now Tell al-Fara'in (Pharaohs' Mound) near the city of Desouk (Arabic: دسوق‎), was an ancient city located 95 km east of Alexandria in the Nile Delta of Egypt.

event.title: the cultural developments of ten thousand years

data.event: The city was an important site in the Predynastic era of Ancient Egypt that includes the cultural developments of ten thousand years from the Paleolithic to 3100 BC.
